item.title: Contributing
item.description: Thanks for your interest in improving Kythera! There are multiple opportunities to contribute at any level. It doesn’t matter if you are just getting started with Rust or are the most weathered expert, we can use your help. No contribution is too small and all contributions are valued. The best way to make a contribution would be to open an issue related to a problem that you have faced or open a new PR with your suggested changes.
